name: The Rare Brand Market Cookbook - VOLUME 1
description: The very first Rare Brand Market Cookbook celebrating 55 artisan independent food producers based all over the U.K. This book tells the story behind each brand and why they are special as well as featuring an easy-to-follow recipe using one of these incredible products. The Rare Brand Market Cookbook - Volume 1 provides a must-have directory of excellent food brands - the total inspiration behind The Rare Brand Larder, new sibling to The Rare Brand Market. All products featured in this book will also available in this store in the not too distant future, so check back soon for store updates! Â£2.00 from the sale of every book goes straight to Action Against Hunger. For orders of 3 books or more, please email emma@therarebrandmarket.co.uk for a shipping quote.
